channel.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
channel.description:
i been recentley been working on a runescape private server im only 14 and after reading some nasty comments im a bit scared because people sayed they could send me to the boys home or sue me :( is this true if so how serious an what is the estamaited fine or jail time
plz help me soon im freaking out

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

they will look for servers with a webclient, which they can make you stop, but you can always go back to downloadable clients.

i think its something to do with the stream file that has been actually copyed in the client and so its theres, its on rune serva anyway if you wish to look.

Read full topic

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Don’t become to big. And certainly not commercial. Also, some servers have something like: “Jagex aint allowed here” in their terms of service.

Read full topic

okay is there certain percosions i should take to help me prevent them from finding out and keeping me and my players safe

item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

No, they’ll never allow private servers.
As long as you didn’t receive a notice from Jagex, you don’t have anything to worry about.

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

:o i live in canada but i was woundering did runescape ever allow a private server under cirtain sircumstances like givving proper credit

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

It really depends on your country’s laws regarding copyright and such. As far as i know, Blizzard sued a few servers hosted in Canada. And that’s because of the laws in Canada.

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

There is always a risk of being sued by Jagex no matter what size your server, true, the bigger your server is, the more likely action will be taken, But, my server had 10 people and they did manage to get my computer confiscated for 3 hours by the court to delete everything off of it, but that was all i got because of the size of the server and me running it for no-income at all.

@relmitos - Your somewhat right on the actions part, he is not, his parents are.

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

If you stop publicly hosting after they have requested to do so, nothing will happen.
If you don’t they’ll have your website taken down(if you have one). And that’s about it. Unless your country’s law says otherwise, wich I highly doubt.

Since you’re only 14 years old, you are not responsible for your actions. So don’t worry to much… They won’t beat you up or anything.

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

thank you i just like to know if i did get caught or got a notice would they disregard it if i deleted all the server and client info cause im only 14 and i dont want a record oh and i got more info for you about a year ago i made a habbo hote lprivate server qith over 1 000 people playing it one day after school when i went on my site it had a black white screen saying mr. coombs you have been sued for reasons and there for you are banned and we will see you friday after i never heard anything could this be just a scare

but manly focus on my first question

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Also. That notice looks more like a request…
I received one of those from Blizzard 3-4 years ago. Saying that I should stop right away. Otherwise legal actions would be taken.

And yet my server remained online until 1,5 years ago.

Read full topic
item.source: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(

item.title: What would happen if i got caught ! plz help me :(
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:320708”]There’s alot of commotion about private servers, and if they are illegal or not.
But rest assured, nothing is going to happen to the smaller private servers. The big ones might receive a notice from Jagex.[/quote]
Correct, unless you receive a direct notice from Jagex, you don’t have much to worry about.
This might help you: http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

Read full topic
